abstract: Comcast said its 51 percent rise in profit helps to justify the purchase of NBCUniversal from General Electric.
snippet: Comcast said its 51 percent rise in profit helps to justify the purchase of NBCUniversal from General Electric.
lead_paragraph: It has been six months since Comcast gained control of NBCUniversal from General Electric, and the Comcast chief executive Brian L. Roberts says he continues to believe that “our timing was just right.”

headline.main: NBCUniversal Helps Lift Comcast’s Quarterly Results
headline.print_headline: NBCUniversal Helps Lift Comcast’s Quarterly Results
